STBICM.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00010 #define TO_FILE
00011 
00012 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00013 #include "SISO.h"//SISO class
00014 #include "STC.h" //STC class
00015 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00016 
00017 using namespace itpp;
00018 using tr::STC;
00019 using tr::SISO;
00020 using tr::threshold;
00021 using std::cout;
00022 using std::endl;
00023 using std::string;
00024 
00025 int main(void)
00026 {
00027     //receiver parameters
00028     ivec gen = "0133 0171";
00029     int constraint_length = 7;
00030     int const_size = 4;//constellation size
00031     int coherence_time = 512;//expressed in symbol durations, multiple of T, T<=coherence_time<=tx_duration, T is the ST code duration
00032     double threshold_value = 50;
00033     string map_metric="maxlogMAP";
00034     string demapper_method = "Hassibi_maxlogMAP";//Hassibi_maxlogMAP or GA or sGA or mmsePIC or zfPIC or Alamouti_maxlogMAP
00035     int nb_errors_lim = 1500;
00036     int nb_bits_lim = int(1e6);
00037     int perm_len = pow2i(14);//permutation length
00038     int nb_iter = 5;//number of iterations in the turbo decoder
00039     int rec_antennas = 2;//number of reception antennas
00040     vec EbN0_dB = "0:20";
00041     double Es = 1.0;//mean symbol energy
00042 
00043     //convolutional code generator polynomials
00044     Convolutional_Code nsc;
00045     nsc.set_generator_polynomials(gen, constraint_length);
00046     double coding_rate = 1.0/2.0;
00047 
00048     //QAM modulator class
00049     QAM mod(const_size);
00050 
00051     //Space-Time code parameters
00052     int em_antennas = 2;//number of emission antennas
00053     int channel_uses = 2;//ST code duration
00054     string code_name = "Golden_2x2";//V-BLAST_MxN, Golden_2x2, Damen_2x2, Alamouti_2xN    
00055     STC st_block_code;
00056     st_block_code.setup(em_antennas, channel_uses, code_name, const_size);//generate matrices for LD code (following Hassibi's approach)
00057     int symb_block = st_block_code.get_nb_symbols_per_block();
00058     em_antennas = st_block_code.get_nb_em_antennas();//these parameters could by changed depending on the selected code
00059     channel_uses = st_block_code.get_channel_uses();    
00060 
00061     //recompute interleaver length
00062     int G = coherence_time*mod.bits_per_symbol()*symb_block;
00063     perm_len = G*(perm_len/G);//recompute interleaver length
00064     int block_len = int(coding_rate*perm_len);//informational block length
00065     int nb_symb = perm_len/mod.bits_per_symbol();//number of symbols at the modulator output
00066     int nb_subblocks = nb_symb/symb_block;//number of blocks of ST code emitted in an interleaver period
00067     int tx_duration = channel_uses*nb_subblocks;//transmission duration expressed in number of symbol periods
00068 
00069     //fading channel parameters
00070     if (coherence_time%channel_uses)//check if the coherence time is a multiple of channel_uses
00071     {
00072         coherence_time = channel_uses*(coherence_time/channel_uses);
00073         std::cout << "Warning! The coherence time must be a multiple of T. Choosing coherence_time=channel_uses*floor(coherence_time/channel_uses) = "\
00074         << coherence_time << std::endl;
00075     }
00076     if (coherence_time>tx_duration)
00077     {
00078         coherence_time = channel_uses*(tx_duration/channel_uses);
00079         std::cout << "Warning! The coherence time must be <= tx_duration. Choosing coherence_time = channel_uses*floor(tx_duration/channel_uses) = "\
00080         << coherence_time << std::endl;
00081     }
00082     cmat fading_pattern = ones_c(1, coherence_time/channel_uses);
00083 
00084     //other parameters
00085     string filename = "Res/STBICM_"+map_metric+"_"+demapper_method+".it";
00086     double R = coding_rate*double(mod.bits_per_symbol()*symb_block)/double(channel_uses);//ST code rate in (info.) bits/channel use
00087     vec sigma2 = (0.5*Es/(R*double(mod.bits_per_symbol())))*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00088     int nb_blocks;//number of blocks
00089     int nb_errors;
00090     bvec bits(block_len);//data bits
00091     bvec coded_bits(perm_len);//no tail
00092     cvec em(nb_symb);
00093     ivec perm(perm_len);
00094     ivec inv_perm(perm_len);
00095     //SISO demapper
00096     vec demapper_apriori_data(perm_len);
00097     vec demapper_extrinsic_data(perm_len);
00098     //SISO NSC
00099     vec nsc_intrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00100     vec nsc_apriori_data(block_len);
00101     nsc_apriori_data.zeros();//always zero
00102     vec nsc_extrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00103     vec nsc_extrinsic_data(block_len);
00104     //decision
00105     bvec rec_bits(block_len);    
00106     int snr_len = EbN0_dB.length();
00107     mat ber(nb_iter,snr_len);
00108     ber.zeros();
00109     register int en,n,ns;
00110     cmat S(tx_duration, em_antennas);
00111     cmat rec(tx_duration,rec_antennas);
00112 
00113     //Rayleigh fading
00114     cmat ch_attenuations(em_antennas*rec_antennas,tx_duration/channel_uses);
00115 
00116     //SISO blocks
00117     SISO siso;
00118     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00119     siso.set_generators(gen, constraint_length);
00120     siso.set_demapper_method(demapper_method);
00121     siso.set_constellation(mod.bits_per_symbol(), mod.get_symbols(), mod.get_bits2symbols());      
00122     siso.set_st_block_code(st_block_code.get_nb_symbols_per_block(), st_block_code.get_1st_gen_matrix(), st_block_code.get_2nd_gen_matrix(), rec_antennas);
00123     
00124     //decision
00125     BPSK bpsk;
00126     
00127     //BER
00128     BERC berc;
00129 
00130     //progress timer
00131     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00132     timer.set_max(snr_len);
00133         
00134     //Randomize generators
00135     RNG_randomize();
00136     
00137     //main loop
00138     timer.progress(0.0);
00139     for (en=0;en<snr_len;en++)
00140     {
00141         siso.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00142         nb_errors = 0;
00143         nb_blocks = 0;
00144         while ((nb_errors<nb_errors_lim) && (nb_blocks*block_len<nb_bits_lim))//if at the last iteration the nb. of errors is inferior to lim, then process another block
00145         {
00146             //permutation
00147             perm = sort_index(randu(perm_len));
00148             //inverse permutation
00149             inv_perm = sort_index(perm);
00150 
00151             //bits generation
00152             bits = randb(block_len);
00153 
00154             //convolutional code
00155             nsc.encode(bits, coded_bits);//no tail
00156 
00157             //permutation+QAM modulation
00158             em = mod.modulate_bits(coded_bits(perm))/sqrt(em_antennas);//normalize emitted symbols           
00159 
00160             //ST code
00161             S = st_block_code.encode(em);        
00162 
00163             /* channel matrices (there are tx_duration/tau_c different channel matrices MxN)
00164              * a channel matrix is represented as a M*Nx1 vector (first M elements are the first column of the channel matrix)
00165              * the channel matrix is constant over tau_c symbol periods (a multiple of T symbol durations)
00166              * the channel matrix is the transpose of the true channel matrix
00167              */
00168             ch_attenuations = kron(randn_c(em_antennas*rec_antennas, tx_duration/coherence_time), fading_pattern);
00169 
00170             //flat-fading MIMO channel
00171             for (ns=0;ns<nb_subblocks;ns++)
00172                 rec.set_submatrix(ns*channel_uses, (ns+1)*channel_uses-1, 0, rec_antennas-1, \
00173                     S(ns*channel_uses, (ns+1)*channel_uses-1, 0, em_antennas-1)*reshape(ch_attenuations.get_col(ns), em_antennas, rec_antennas));                                       
00174             rec += sqrt(2*sigma2(en))*randn_c(tx_duration,rec_antennas);//sigma2 is the variance on each dimension
00175 
00176             //turbo receiver
00177             demapper_apriori_data.zeros();//a priori information of emitted bits
00178             siso.set_impulse_response(ch_attenuations);
00179             for (n=0;n<nb_iter;n++)
00180             {               
00181                 //first decoder
00182                 siso.demapper(demapper_extrinsic_data, rec, demapper_apriori_data);
00183 
00184                 //deinterleave+threshold
00185                 nsc_intrinsic_coded = threshold(demapper_extrinsic_data(inv_perm), threshold_value);
00186 
00187                 //second decoder
00188                 siso.nsc(nsc_extrinsic_coded, nsc_extrinsic_data, nsc_intrinsic_coded, nsc_apriori_data, false);
00189 
00190                 //decision
00191                 rec_bits = bpsk.demodulate_bits(-nsc_extrinsic_data);//suppose that a priori info is zero
00192                 //count errors
00193                 berc.clear();
00194                 berc.count(bits, rec_bits);
00195                 ber(n,en) += berc.get_errorrate();
00196 
00197                 //interleave
00198                 demapper_apriori_data = nsc_extrinsic_coded(perm);
00199             }//end iterations
00200             nb_errors += int(berc.get_errors());//get number of errors at the last iteration
00201             nb_blocks++;
00202         }//end blocks (while loop)
00203 
00204         //compute BER over all tx blocks
00205         ber.set_col(en, ber.get_col(en)/nb_blocks);
00206 
00207         //show progress
00208         timer.progress(1+en);
00209     }
00210     timer.toc_print();
00211 
00212 #ifdef TO_FILE
00213     //save results to file
00214     it_file ff(filename);
00215     ff << Name("BER") << ber;
00216     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00217     ff << Name("gen") << gen;
00218     ff << Name("coding_rate") << coding_rate;
00219     ff << Name("nb_iter") << nb_iter;
00220     ff << Name("block_len") << block_len;
00221     ff << Name("nb_errors_lim") << nb_errors_lim;
00222     ff << Name("nb_bits_lim") << nb_bits_lim;
00223     ff.close();
00224 #else
00225     //show BER
00226     cout << ber << endl;
00227 #endif
00228 
00229     return 0;
00230 }
